resources.string: This is to certify that Mr.Shubham Soni was working at Dharam Software Foundation from 21th-July-2021 to 09th-feb-2022 as a "Android Developer" More over, I would like to reflect over his conduct during his stay with us. During his service he had been found sincere, reliable, trustworthy, sociable, pleasant and open to challenges he had a genial temperament and can efficiently work in a team.All of our staff members are pleased with him and feels comfortable in teaming and coordinating with him for the realization of organizational goals and objectives.
